      • train

        public boolean train(Matrix trainData,
            Matrix trainLabel,
            boolean isRegression)
        Train the model
        参数:
        trainData - - train data
        trainLabel - - train labels
        isRegression - - the class used for regression or classification
        返回:
        - whether the train successes

      • findNearest

        public Matrix findNearest(Matrix samples,
                 int k)
        Finds the neighbors and predicts responses for input vectors.
        参数:
        samples - - samples to get classification
        k - - number of used nearest neighbors
        返回:
        - Vector with results of prediction (regression or classification) for each input sample.
